body.name: Thermalright Assassin King 120 SE ARGB CPU Air Cooler, AK120 SE ARB, 5 Heatpipes, TL-C12C-S PWM Quiet Fan CPU Cooler with S-FDB Bearing, for AMD AM4/AM5 Intel LGA1700/1150/1151/1200
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 8 mins
features: 【Brand Overview】Thermalright is a Taiwan brand with more than 20 years of development. It has a certain popularity in the domestic and foreign markets and has a pivotal influence in the player market. We have been focusing on the research and development of computer accessories. R & D product lines include: CPU air-cooled radiator, case fan, thermal silicone pad, thermal silicone grease, CPU fan controller, anti falling off mounting bracket, support mounting bracket and other commodities.

【Product specification】Thermalright AK120 SE ARGB; CPU Cooler dimensions: 120(L)x73(W)x148(H)mm (4.92x2.87x 5.83 inch); Product weight:0.52kg(1.15lb); heat sink material: aluminum, CPU cooler is equipped with metal fasteners of Intel & AMD platform to achieve better installation.

【PWM Fan】Model:TL-C12C-S V1.0; Colorful and gorgeous ARGB light effects; Standard size PWM fan:120x120x25mm (4.72x4.72x0.98 inches); fan speed (RPM):1550rpm±10%; power port: 4pin; Voltage:12V; Air flow:66.17CFM(MAX); Noise Level≤25.6dB(A), the fan pairs efficient cool with low-noise-level, providing you an environment with both efficient cool and true quietness.

【AGHP technique】5×6mm heat pipes apply AGHP III technique, Solve the Inverse gravity effect caused by vertical / horizontal orientation,Up to 20000 hours of industrial service life, S-FDB bearings ensure long service life of air-cooler radiators. UL class a safety insulation low-grade, industrial gray PBT + PC material to create high-quality products for you. The height is 148mm, Suitable for medium-sized computer case.
【Compatibility】The CPU cooler Socket supports: Intel:115X/1200/1700/17XX, AMD:AM4:AM5 For different CPU socket platforms, corresponding mounting plate or fastener parts are provided.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EXCELLENCE USER EXPERIENCE Premium THERMALRIGHT TF-4 thermal paste is also included with CPU cooler for the best out-of-the-box performance. Redesigned Thermalright SS2 mounting system offers easy installation process and optimal mounting pressure. 5 AGHP (ANTI-GRAVITY HEAT PIPE) TECHNOLOGY HEAT PIPES Common heat pipes heavily depend on gravity to achieve optimal performance. Heatsink equipped with THERMALRIGHT Special design AGHP Heat Pipes is not affected by the mounting direction. This ensures user’s cooler experience in different computer case designs. BALANCE PERFORMANCE TL-C12C-S FAN Based on TL-C12 fan design, TL-C12C-S fan series achieve optimal balance between performance and noise output, therefore they are all-around fan for heatsink or radiator use scenarios. The motor is equipped with S-FDB bearing for smooth operation and long life span. The S model comes with addressable RGB lighting for aesthetic performance.

AK120 SE ARGB AX120R SE AXP120 X67 BA120 FC140 TFX 2G Heatpipe 5×6mm heatpipes 4×6mm heatpipes 6×6mm heatpipes 6×6mm heatpipes 5×8mm heatpipes CPU Sockel Intel: LGA1150,LGA1151,LGA1155,LGA1156,LGA1200,LGA1700; AMD: AM4 AM5 Intel: LGA1150,LGA1151,LGA1155,LGA1156,LGA1200,LGA1700; AMD: AM4 AM5 Intel: LGA1150,LGA1151,LGA1155,LGA1156,LGA1200,LGA2011,LGA2066, LGA1700; AMD: AM4 Intel: LGA1150,LGA1151, LGA1155,LGA1156,LGA1200,LGA1700; AMD: AM4 AM5 Intel: LGA1150,LGA1151,LGA1155,LGA1156,LGA1200,LGA2011,LGA2066, LGA1700; AMD: AM4 AM5 Vitesse du ventilateur 1550±10%RPM 1550±10%RPM 1800±10%RPM 1550±10%RPM 1850±10%RPM Hauteur 148MM/5.83in 148MM/5.83in 67MM/2.64in 154MM/6.06in 160MM/6.3in Rôle Refroidisseur de processeur Refroidisseur de processeur Refroidisseur de processeur Refroidisseur de processeur Refroidisseur de processeur pâte thermique

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Budget Cooler.
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about this cooler. It's quiet (Almost Silent), not too cumbersome and it Cooooooolz. Also doesn't interfere with Ram slots/sticks. The mounting is very secure and should be pretty easy for any novice PC builder (Pay attention to the orientation of the bottom brackets). I recently built a computer (Mar./2023) with a 3rd gen intel processor (3770k). I was able to achieve a stable 4.6 ghz overclock and stay under 75c, w/ 100% load (Core Damage Stress Test) and under 65 in Cinebench 23. My original build had an H75 AIO by Corsair. I could only achieve 4.4 with that configuration, using the same MOBO & Memory (Z77-UD5H & Gskill Ripjaws 1866 ddr3). Yes this is an old processor, however, if your looking to do a Ryzen 5600x build or similar, the TDP on that chip is 65w, as opposed to 77w for the 3770k. I think this is a great option for lower end to mid tier modern processors (Mostly AMD). IMO, this a very capable cooler at a budget price. This cooler got a positive review by Gamers Nexxus, that's why I gave it a shot. I am extremely happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Se ve de calidad y muy eficiente para disipar el calor
reviews.reviewText: Se ve robusto, pero realmente funcional, facil de instalar, trae las respectivas instrucciones en el manual y siguiendo las indicaciones lo instale facil, y cumple muy bien su funcion y silencioso. Lo uso en un core i5 12400 y en tareas pesadas y juegos el procesador no pasa de los 60 grados. Muy buen disipador

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: With a little lapping and Liquid Metal my 13900k was idling within 7C of room temperature on a $21 air cooler. Enough said.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cumple muy bien, buen producto de momento

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Lo utilizo con un i5-2400 en mi PC secundaria,lo mantiene muy frío,no pasa de 40° en reposo y de 65° jugando

Tenía un disipador de stock, y normalmente estaba entre 47° y 50 grados sin carga, ahora está en un promedio 38° me gustó bastante, aunque para mí placa es algo grande, funciona.Pd. Uso una pasta terminar mx-4 y la temperatura ambiente promedió es de 35° 👍
Lo usé para un Ryzen 7 5700G. Hizo una diferencia de 10C versus el enfriador que viene con el CPU y por el precio estoy muy satisfecho.
Le gustó mucho a mi hijo para ventilar más su PC
